contextId.occurrenceNote: "By word" here is a synecdoche for "by instructions" or "by teachings." You can make clear the implicit information. Alternate translation: "whether by what we taught you in person or by what we wrote to you in a letter" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-explicit]] and [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-synecdoche]])
contextId.quote: εἴτε διὰ λόγου, εἴτε δι’ ἐπιστολῆς ἡμῶν
contextId.glQuote: whether by word or by our letter

contextId.occurrenceNote: You can make explicit that this is Paul's prayer for the Thessalonians. Alternate translation: "I pray that the Lord of peace himself gives you" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-explicit]])
contextId.quote: αὐτὸς ... ὁ Κύριος τῆς εἰρήνης, δῴη ὑμῖν
contextId.glQuote: may the Lord of peace himself give you
